EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - VMware Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp VMware Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the VMware Webinar. Date: Thursday, March 19 Time: 9 am Pacific / 12 pm Eastern (4 pm GMT)
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=intapp&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: IntApp
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: US/Canada: 877-917-3617 UK: 1-312-470-7008 (give operator the passcode: "IntApp" and conference leader's name: "Neal Vora")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
